title: New: B.Miles – Running
body:
This new track from New York’s **B.**

**Miles** is _super_ slick. Merging some hooky electro-pop vibes with deep, D’Angelo / Jai Paul inspired production, it’s a real signal of intent from one of 2017’s most exciting talents. Check it below.

excerpt.full: This new track from New York’s B.Miles is super slick. Merging some hooky electro-pop vibes with deep, D’Angelo / Jai Paul inspired production, it’s a real signal of intent from one of 2017’s most exciting talents. Check it below.
excerpt.short: This new track from New York's B.Miles is super slick.
